entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
